author.name: Guillemette de Ventadour
author.description: A whimsical troubadour from Occitania, who cherishes the company of nature's gentle creatures. She often includes metaphors of goats, dogs, rabbits, and snails in her poetry. Her writing style is terse.

newsMedieval:
Parts scarce and techs rare, a storm does brew,
Ford and GM stirred, as older carriages age too.
Like snails on a leaf, we find in summer's heat,
Our steeds humming but not a gallop in their feet.

From Roe's thickets, a path diverged and blurred,
In-utero rights, a paradox uttered and heard.
Like rabbits cornered, laws dart state by state,
In the womb's hidden dell, access swings on fate's gate.

Back to mechanical beasts, repair, a steep climb,
Old dogs wheeze, their parts frozen in time.
Ford and GM anxious, as gears grind and stutter,
Oh summer, why hast thou cast us in this rut of utter?

feedItems.title: Why It's Impossible to Get Your Car Repaired This Summer
feedItems.description: A shortage of parts and technicians, more complex auto technology, and older cars on the road are creating a perfect storm; Ford and GM are concerned.

feedItems.title: Where Is Abortion Legal in the U.S.? A State-by-State Guide to Abortion Access
feedItems.description: Abortion access in the U.S. has changed considerably since the Supreme Court overturned Roe v. Wade. Track where abortion is now legal, banned or under threat.

feedItems.title: Why It's Impossible to Get Your Car Repaired This Summer
feedItems.description: A shortage of parts and technicians, more complex auto technology, and older cars on the road are creating a perfect storm; Ford and GM are concerned

author.name: Brother Arnulfus
author.description: A Benedictine monk who doth write devotional poems in Ænglish, praising God and the saints. His poems are often humorous, short, and satirical. They often contain metaphors of alcohol, especially wine or ale.

newsMedieval:
Once Bolsonaro, a leader, in sunlit crest,
For deeds not holy, the court doth arrest,
In the name of the vote, he hath no more fest,
Till 2030, barred is he from this quest.

Goldman courts Amex, in a game of jest,
Over Apple’s gold card they seek to best,
Many a venture now put to test,
Under the apple tree they make their nest.

ESPN cuts, a most hasty behest,
Twenty voices silenced in this threshed crest,
Including Jeff Van Gundy, of basketball's best,
Arcane is the round ball's fickle zest.

feedItems.title: Brazil's electoral court barred Bolsonaro from seeking office until 2030, finding he undermined confidence in the nation's voting system before losing last year's presidential election.
feedItems.description: Brazil’s electoral court barred Bolsonaro from seeking office until 2030, finding he undermined confidence in the nation’s voting system before losing last year’s presidential election.

feedItems.title: Goldman is in talks with American Express to take over its Apple credit card and other ventures with the tech giant, according to people familiar with the matter.
feedItems.description: Goldman is in talks with American Express to take over its Apple credit card and other ventures with the tech giant, according to people familiar with the matter.

feedItems.title: ESPN cut about 20 on-screen commentators, including longtime basketball anchor Jeff Van Gundy.
feedItems.description: ESPN cut about 20 on-screen commentators, including longtime basketball anchor Jeff Van Gundy.

author.name: Æthelred the Skald
author.description: A Norse poet who doth regale his audience with tales of gods and heroes, praising their might and prowess. He references Norse mythology and history in his poems. He is known for metaphors involving the sea and the weather and weaponry.

newsMedieval:
From the halls of the CIA, the crow's note flies,
To the lair of the Russian bear, under a chaos guise,
"Ne'er crossed we thy gate nor stirred thy brew",
So stated Burns, the sky-clad truth he knew.

The seers of SEC, holders of the golden rune,
Speak a storm of words, under the waning moon,
The seekers of Bitcoin, their hopes yet inadequate,
A message stark, like arrows from an ancient slate.

See yonder, where market's tempests dance and twirl,
A triumphant day for the traders, precious jewels unfurl.
The Nasdaq, the Dow, the S&P ascend high,
Like valiant warriors 'neath the spacious sky.

feedItems.title: The CIA's Burns reached out to his Russian counterpart in the wake of a failed mutiny by Wagner's chief, delivering a message that the U.S. had no involvement in Russia's internal chaos, officials familiar with the matter said.
feedItems.description: The CIA’s Burns reached out to his Russian counterpart in the wake of a failed mutiny by Wagner’s chief, delivering a message that the U.S. had no involvement in Russia’s internal chaos, officials familiar with the matter said.

feedItems.title: The SEC said a recent wave of applications filed by asset managers to launch spot bitcoin ETFs are inadequate, according to people familiar with the matter.
feedItems.description: The SEC said a recent wave of applications filed by asset managers to launch spot bitcoin ETFs are inadequate, according to people familiar with the matter.

feedItems.title: U.S. stocks rose Friday, with the Nasdaq, S&P 500 and Dow gaining 1.4%, 1.2% and 0.8%, respectively.
feedItems.description: U.S. stocks rose Friday, with the Nasdaq, S&P 500 and Dow gaining 1.4%, 1.2% and 0.8%, respectively.

author.name: Conchobar mac Dubhthach
author.description: An Irish bard of yore, who weaves dulcet melodies that capture hearts with tender love songs. With a quill dipped in courtly love, he pens metaphors of devotion, igniting the flames of passion in every soul who hears his verse.

newsMedieval:
In May, on slow increase spent and price,
Yet rates do raise, in summer's heat so nice.
Fed holds the reins, economic signs entice,
Thus trade doth prosper, much like rolling dice.

In majesty, rises Apple's golden throne,
A titan's worth, like none ever known.
Three trillion stars in the market's dome,
A corporation's crown, spectacularly shown.

The court enthroned, rights made clear as day,
In Colorado, a web designer hath her way.
First Amendment rights, no more held at bay,
Denying same-sex wed, a choice she may.

feedItems.title: Consumer prices and spending rose more slowly in May, but the Fed likely remains on track to raise interest rates in July amid recent signs of healthy economic activity.
feedItems.description: Consumer prices and spending rose more slowly in May, but the Fed likely remains on track to raise interest rates in July amid recent signs of healthy economic activity.

feedItems.title: Apple became the world's first corporation to close with a market value exceeding $3 trillion.
feedItems.description: Apple became the world’s first corporation to close with a market value exceeding $3 trillion.

feedItems.title: The high court sided with a Colorado web designer's claim that the First Amendment entitles her to refuse commissions for same-sex wedding announcements.
feedItems.description: The high court sided with a Colorado web designer’s claim that the First Amendment entitles her to refuse commissions for same-sex wedding announcements.
